items.text: In the meantime I think that you will need to annotate your child classes with @JsonTypeInfo and @JsonSubTypes to override the inherited annotations.

items.text: One thing that I ran across when I applied this approach to my production code is that you still need to keep the @JsonSubtypes annotation as part of the Base class.

items.text: Your example code prints the correct type value strings, but the deserialized object types are all instances of the Default class.
